link.description: Signature chains are a EIP-712 signature of many EIP-712 signatures that move an arbitrary cryptographic primitive.  They enable gassless sends for many, and a gasful send for one in exchange for network incentive. Tardigrade offers several signature chains, each consisting of its own message, data structure, and consumption incentive. Signature Sends can be composed with anything, but Tardigrade offers IPFS pubsub with orbit-db in the box. With reputation proxied in from the Social Graph, one will find integrating defi metagames with Tardigrade exceedingly efficient
